name: Twogether_By_PocitGaming
description:
# Twogether hra by PocitGaming #

Story: Sitting around a crackling fire in the depths of the forest, the brothers told each other stories of adventures. Suddenly, heavy rain extinguished their flames, plunging them into darkness. Undisturbed, they moved forward, but the dense forest sent chills down their spines. As soon as fear began to grip them, they caught a glimpse of the old mansion in the distance. The brothers rushed to him, their hearts pounding with excitement and trembling. When they entered the building, they were struck by its beauty but dismayed by its sinister presence. The brothers knew they needed to stick together and not get separated, but the mansion harbors secrets that challenge their courage and cunning. Our game is an unexpected adventure for brave players.

Instruction: The younger brother is controlled by the arrows and crouch with the help of the left Control.  The older brother is controlled with the keys WASD and jumps with the space. You can use 'E' for action. 

Github odkaz : 

https://github.com/Dalibor-Duris-code/Together_GameJam2023.git
